# Stone Shape, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (soft clay)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Stone or stone object touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 10 cu. ft./level

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 208

*You mutter the ancient words, and your hands glow yellow where they touch the stone. Where you touch, the stone seems as soft as clay.*

This spell functions like *[[Stone Shape (Spell)|stone shape]]*, except that it affects a much larger quantity of stone.
